mapper.select: SELECT o.orderStatus, o.orderNo, o.orderDate, o.orderTotalPrice, MAX(i.imgFilePath) AS imgFilePath, CASE WHEN COUNT(i.itemNo) > 1 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(i.itemTitle ORDER BY i.itemTitle ASC), ',', 1), ' 외 ', COUNT(i.itemNo) - 1, '개') ELSE GROUP_CONCAT(i.itemTitle) END AS itemTitle FROM `order` o LEFT Join orderdetail od ON o.orderNo = od.orderNo LEFT Join item i on i.itemNo = od.itemNo WHERE o.memberId = #{memberId} GROUP BY o.orderNo;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order`(orderDate, recipientName, recipientPhone, deliveryPostcode, deliveryAddress, deliveryDetailAddress, deliveryExtraAddress, orderStatus, orderPoint, deliveryCharge, orderTotalPrice, memberId) VALUES(now(), #{recipientName}, #{recipientPhone}, #{deliveryPostcode}, #{deliveryAddress}, #{deliveryDetailAddress}, #{deliveryExtraAddress} ,#{orderStatus}, #{orderPoint}, #{deliveryCharge}, #{orderTotalPrice}, #{memberId})
